First Notice of Infringement and Declaration 
 
TO: 
PANICATTHEDISCO.INFO 
Rick Houston 
SalonServices.net 
400 Shearer Blvd 
Cocoa, FL 32922 
Phone: +1.4077199634 
rick@tanningonline.com 
 
Everyones Internet  Inc. 
390 Benmar 
Suite 200 
Houston TX  77060 
Phone: 1-713-579-2850 
abuse@ev1.net 
 
 
REGARDING:  http://www.panicatthedisco.info 
 
IMMEDIATELY REMOVE THE ENTIRE SITE,  WWW.PANICATTHEDISCO.INFO, WHICH 
VIOLATES THE COPYRIGHT OF ATLANTIC RECORDS GROUP AND THE ARTISTS PANIC
AT 
THE DISCO. 
 
THIS SITE ONLY EXISTS TO IMPERSONATE PANIC AT THE DISCO,  PROFIT FROM

PIRATED 
MUSIC. 
 
http://www.panicatthedisco.info 
 
NOTE:  If you do not comply with this demand immediately, we will seek

law, 
the Lanham Act and any applicable international laws or treaties. 
 
 
ATLANTIC RECORDS GROUP

1. I am the owner or an agent authorized to act on behalf of the owner

2. I have a good faith belief that the materials identified in the
addendum

the

of

United States 
Australia

Canada 
EUR

Germany 
Italy 
Japan 
Netherlands 
Russia 
United Kingdom 
All of the above    X

items claimed to be infringing. 
 
3. I may be contacted at: 
 
Printed Name:  Dorothy Sherman 
Title:              Consultant 
Company:        Atlantic Records Group 
Address:         1290 Avenue of the Americas 
                     New York, NY  10104 
                     Attn:  Ariel Taitz, Esq. 
 
Email (correspondence): GrayZone@grayzone.com 
www.grayzone.com

Fax:             718 552-3028

the

letter

DMCA. 
 
I make this declaration conscientiously, believing it to be true and

above.  I am aware and agree that the contents of this statement may be 
relied upon against me in any court or arbitration proceeding. 
 
Truthfully, 
 
Dorothy Sherman 
Digital Signature:  Verisign 
 
Date:  23 FEBRUARY 2007
